lead_paragraph: The most spectacular and costly failure in Atlantic City's 36-year history of casino gambling began to play out Monday when the $2.4 billion Revel Casino Hotel emptied its hotel.

headline.main: Atlantic City's Revel Starts Closing After 2 Years
headline.print_headline: Atlantic City's Revel Starts Closing After 2 Years
